description:
Job Description
  • Purchase maintenance parts and services information supplied in written and oral form from the maintenance dept.
  • Contacting vendors to purchase materials and contract services.
  • Plan and prepare schedules based on the directions of the Engineering Manager
  • Determine the material and tools/equipment requirements
  • Ensure Maintenance Planning/Scheduling needs are completed, coordinated, and communicated within all functional areas including contractor & vendor management.
  • Verify the availability of required materials before scheduling work orders
  • Create purchase orders for materials and replacement parts
  • Track the status of parts and change the status of work schedules based on parts' availability
  • Maintain and manage preventative maintenance system schedule
  • Maintain file system
  • Drive to other facilities or vendors for emergency parts pickup
  • Maintain data entry for maintenance spending/monthly or as requested.
  • Keep maintenance parts inventory current and accurate through physical handling and documentation records up to date.
  • Perform stockroom inventory audits/monthly or as requested.
  • Receive, store, and identify parts as needed.
  • Participate in the team environment of Q&B Foods. Help co-workers when they are backed up.
  • Follow all safety policies and procedures.
  • Maintain a clean work area.
  • Must be physically capable to lift 50lbs
  • Perform other duties as assigned.


Qualifications

  • Strong electrical and mechanical aptitude with a background in reliability.
  • Customer service focus
  • Highly organized
  • Ability to manage multiple tasks/projects with competing deadlines
  • Strong communication skills to effectively communicate with personnel of various levels


Education/Experience

  • Associate’s degree or a minimum of 3 years’ experience in manufacturing, equipment maintenance, or materials management
  • Language Skills: Must be able to read and write fluently in English
  • Mathematical Skills: Must be extremely accurate with numbers. Ability to add, subtracts, multiply and divides; use common fractions and decimals.


Computer Skills

  • MS Excel/Access/Word/SAP.
  • Experience working with PMMS



Q&B Foods, Inc.

As a division of Kewpie Corporation, Japan's leading manufacturer of mayonnaise, salad dressings, sauces, marinades, and related products, California-based Q&B Foods, Inc. is uniquely qualified to produce the highest quality and tastiest products in the US marketplace.

Our highly qualified management teams and representatives are dedicated to maintaining our exceptional reputation, which has made Q&B Foods one of the premiere suppliers to leading businesses around the world.
